summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Seattle School District for financial assistance to produce a video on the proper use of implementing an incident command system protocol relating to school violence; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2001 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
